channel.title: Need help with one small thing please
channel.description: How do I change what it says when people log in? Like in project 16 it says Wolf:Qutting untill december.. how can i change that to my name and the server name into killscape2 and i need to know how to make my monsters say if mod, admin's, or the owner is online please help.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 06:05:24 PM[/size][hr]come on please help

item.title: Need help with one small thing please
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

look for where it says that and replace it with what you want for example

ex:
sendMessage(“Welcome to blitzscape!”);
sendMessage(“Modz: blitz (owner),”);
sendMessage(“sleepy(second owner)”);
sendMessage(“TYPE ::menuhelp For More Menu’s”);

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with one small thing please
